LINKED_EMAIL.title: Email
LINKED_EMAIL.description: You can now login and receive notifications via email.

LINKED_WALLET.title: Wallet
LINKED_WALLET.description: You can now login via your lightning wallet.

SET_AVATAR_URL.title: Avatar
SET_AVATAR_URL.description: You put a face to your name. Great!

SET_LIGHTNING_ADDRESS.title: Lightning Address
SET_LIGHTNING_ADDRESS.description: You can now be tipped directly by other Lightsats users.

TIP_WITHDRAWN.title: Tip Withdrawn
TIP_WITHDRAWN.description: You got someone to withdraw their sats!

WEBLN_WITHDRAWN.title: WebLN Withdrawal
WEBLN_WITHDRAWN.description: WebLN saves a lot of clicks!

MANUAL_WITHDRAWN.title: Manual Withdrawal
MANUAL_WITHDRAWN.description: There are better methods than this, but it's good to know how to do manual withdrawals!

LNURL_WITHDRAWN.title: LNURL withdrawal
LNURL_WITHDRAWN.description: You withdrew to a LNURL-withdraw capable wallet. Nice!

EARLY_SUPPORTER.title: Early Supporter
EARLY_SUPPORTER.description: You were one of the first to successfully tip someone using Lightsats!

SENT_1K.description: Your recipients have withdrawn over one thousand sats!

SENT_10K.description: Your recipients have withdrawn over ten thousand sats!

SENT_100K.description: Your recipients have withdrawn over one hundred thousand sats!

SENT_1M.description: Your recipients have withdrawn over one million sats!

TOP_10.title: Leaderboard Top 10
TOP_10.description: You achieved a position in the top 10!

TOP_3.title: Leaderboard Top 3
TOP_3.description: You achieved a position in the top 3!

TOP_1.title: Top of the Leaderboard
TOP_1.description: You achieved the top position on the leaderboard!

MOST_WITHDRAWN_TIPS.title: Champion
MOST_WITHDRAWN_TIPS.description: You have created the most successful tips out of any Lightsats tipper.

PWA.title: Added to Homescreen
PWA.description: You added the Lightsats PWA to your mobile homescreen. Use LNURL auth to login!

TIPS_10.description: You sent 10 tips that were successfully withdrawn by their recipient.

TIPS_25.description: You sent 25 tips that were successfully withdrawn by their recipient.
